groups.name: Npm
groups.visibleRule: scanType = SCA || scanType = SAST || scanType = SBOM

groups.name: SCA-DAST-CSA-SAST
groups.visibleRule: scanType = CSA || scanType = SCA || scanType = DAST || scanType = SAST

groups.name: SCA-SAST-SBOM
groups.visibleRule: scanType = SCA || scanType = SAST || scanType = SBOM

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: SOOS API Key

inputs.name: clientId
inputs.label: Client Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: SOOS Client Id

inputs.name: scanType
inputs.label: Scan Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of scan you would like to run.

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the project. Defaults to 'Build.Repository.Name'.

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the branch. Defaults to 'System.PullRequest.SourceBranch' when available, otherwise 'Build.SourceBranch'.

inputs.name: branchUri
inputs.label: Branch URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: The link to the current branch. Defaults to 'Build.Repository.Uri'.

inputs.name: commitHash
inputs.label: Commit Hash
inputs.helpMarkDown: The commit hash associated with the code being analyzed. Defaults to 'Build.SourceVersion'.

inputs.name: buildVersion
inputs.label: Build Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The current build version.

inputs.name: buildUri
inputs.label: Build URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: The link to the current build. Defaults to 'Build.BuildUri'.

inputs.name: exportFormat
inputs.label: Export Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file format to use when exporting results. See https://kb.soos.io/project-exports-and-reports for valid options.

inputs.name: exportFileType
inputs.label: Export File Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file type to use when exporting results. See https://kb.soos.io/project-exports-and-reports for valid options.

inputs.name: projectPath
inputs.label: Project (Source Code) Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The relative path to the project root. Defaults to 'Build.SourcesDirectory'. (Where the files to scan are located)

inputs.name: fileMatchType
inputs.label: File Match Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The method to use to locate files for scanning, looking for manifest files and/or files to hash.

inputs.name: packageManagers
inputs.label: Package Managers
inputs.helpMarkDown: A list of package managers, delimited by comma, to include when searching for manifest files.

inputs.name: excludedDirectories
inputs.label: Excluded Directory Glob Patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: A list of directory glob patterns, delimited by comma, to exclude when searching for manifest or SBOM files. (e.g. '**/not_these/*.config')

inputs.name: excludedFiles
inputs.label: Excluded Files Glob Patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: A list of files glob patterns, delimited by comma, to exclude when searching for manifest or SBOM files. (e.g. '**/requirements.txt')

inputs.name: outputDirectory
inputs.label: Export file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory to export scans to. Defaults to 'Build.SourcesDirectory'.

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The working directory mounted for container to access files and exports. Defaults to 'Build.SourcesDirectory'.

inputs.name: targetUri
inputs.label: Target Uri
inputs.helpMarkDown: This can either be the URL of the application you wish to scan, starting with 'http://' or 'https://', or the relative to the workingDirectory path to the spec file you wish to scan (e.g. openapi.json).

inputs.name: onFailure
inputs.label: On Failure
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to perform when the scan fails.

inputs.name: apiFormat
inputs.label: Api Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: The target API format: openapi, soap, or graphql.

inputs.name: useAjaxSpider
inputs.label: Use Ajax Spider
inputs.helpMarkDown: When true the scan will use the ajax spider which is slower than the traditional spider but is better at handling applications that make heavy use of Javascript.

inputs.name: scanDurationInMinutes
inputs.label: Scan Duration In Minutes
inputs.helpMarkDown: The duration of time in minutes for the spider to run before reporting the results.

inputs.name: disableRules
inputs.label: Disable Rules
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of ZAP rules IDs to disable. List for reference https://www.zaproxy.org/docs/alerts/. (e.g. 10001,10002)

inputs.name: logLevel
inputs.label: Log Level
inputs.helpMarkDown: Minimum Log Level to display across the Task.

inputs.name: dockerImageTag
inputs.label: Docker Image Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: The tag of the SOOS docker image you wish to run.

inputs.name: scriptVersion
inputs.label: SOOS Script Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of the SOOS package to run. Defaults to latest.

inputs.name: contextFile
inputs.label: Context File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the context file which will be loaded prior to scanning the target (e.g. Default.context).

inputs.name: requestHeaders
inputs.label: Request Headers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Headers added to every request. Example: header1:value1, header2:value2

inputs.name: bearerToken
inputs.label: Bearer Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Bearer token to include in the authorization header on every request.

inputs.name: authFormType
inputs.label: Form Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: simple (all fields are displayed at the same time), wait_for_password (Password field is displayed only after username is filled), or multi_page (Password field is displayed only after username is filled and submit is clicked)

inputs.name: authUsername
inputs.label: Authentication Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username to use when authenticating.

inputs.name: authPassword
inputs.label: Authentication Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to use when authenticating.

inputs.name: authLoginURL
inputs.label: Authentication URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Login URL to use when authenticating.

inputs.name: authUsernameField
inputs.label: Username Input Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username input id to use when authenticating.

inputs.name: authPasswordField
inputs.label: Password Input Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password input id to use when authenticating.

inputs.name: authSubmitField
inputs.label: Submit Button Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Submit button id to use when authenticating.

inputs.name: authSecondSubmitField
inputs.label: Second Submit Button Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Second submit button id to use in auth apps (for multi-page forms).

inputs.name: authDelayTime
inputs.label: Authentication Delay Time
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delay time in seconds to wait for the page to load after performing actions in the form. (Used only on authFormType: wait_for_password and multi_page).

inputs.name: authVerificationURL
inputs.label: Authentication Verification URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL used to verify authentication success. If authentication fails when this URL is provided, the scan will be terminated.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.label: Enable ZAP debug logging
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enables ZAP debug logging.

inputs.name: oauthTokenUrl
inputs.label: OAuth Token URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The fully qualified authentication URL that grants the access_token.

inputs.name: oauthParameters
inputs.label: OAuth Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Parameters added to the OAuth token request. Example: client_id:value, client_secret:value, grant_type:value

inputs.name: zapOptions
inputs.label: ZAP Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add additional command line options for ZAP

inputs.name: otherOptions
inputs.label: Other Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add additional command line options for items specific to the underlying ZAP or Syft depending on the scan.

inputs.name: targetToScan
inputs.label: The target to scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should be a docker image name.

inputs.name: sbomPath
inputs.label: Sbom Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SBOM file or folder to scan. When a folder is specified all SBOMs found in the folder and sub-folders will be scanned. If not specified it will default to root of the pipeline.

inputs.name: baseUri
inputs.label: API Base URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SOOS Analysis API Base URI.
